mapper.select: SELECT NAME FROM MY_T,MEMBER WHERE MY_T.M_IDX=MEMBER.M_IDX AND T_IDX=#{lastTIdx}
SELECT D_IDX AS DIDX, D_NAME AS DNAME FROM DESIGN WHERE T_IDX=#{tIdx}
SELECT D_PURP FROM D_PURP WHERE D_IDX=#{dIdx}
SELECT D_CON FROM D_CON WHERE D_IDX=#{dIdx}

SELECT W_IDX AS WIDX, WORK, W_PROC AS WPROC, TO_CHAR(W_SDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd' )AS WSDATE, TO_CHAR(W_EDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd' )AS WEDATE, W_MEM AS WMEM, T_IDX AS TIDX FROM WORK WHERE T_IDX=#{tIdx} ORDER BY WPROC DESC
